Class ec.transform.classparser.FieldIntr

   |

public class FieldIntr
extends Object
implements Enumeration
Allows the caller to interate over all the fields in a class.

FieldIntr(Field[])
Build a FieldIntr.

hasMoreElements()
Ask if there are any more fields.
nextElement()
Get the next Field.

FieldIntr 
 public FieldIntr(Field fields[])
Build a FieldIntr.

Parameters:
methods - the array of Field objects in the class

hasMoreElements 
 public boolean hasMoreElements()
Ask if there are any more fields.

nextElement 
 public Object nextElement()
Get the next Field. (Caller will have to cast the result)
